title: Recent Progress in Gene-Targeting Therapies for Spinal Muscular Atrophy: Promises and Challenges
content: Keywords: spinal muscular atrophy (SMA); survival of motor neuron 1 (SMN1); SMN2; SMN protein; antisense oligonucleotide (ASO); nusinersen; gene therapy; onasemnogene; risdiplam; small molecule, combination therapy
